summary: This is a brief internal email or memo from July 26, 2019, providing an update on Jeffrey Epstein's status in custody, specifically noting he is not on suicide watch but is under psychological observation. It appears to be a routine status report from within the detention facility.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified by inmate number #76318-054, the subject of the suicide watch and psychological observation status update while in custody.

events.title: Epstein Custody Status Update
events.description: An internal update is sent regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status in custody, stating he is not on suicide watch but is under psychological observation.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 26, 2019, which is approximately two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It explicitly states Jeffrey Epstein was not on suicide watch at the time of the update.
It notes that Epstein was under psychological observation (Psych Observation 1).
The document appears to be an internal administrative communication regarding inmate status.
Epstein is identified by his federal inmate number: #76318-054.
